code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var initialState={active:false};var sidebarStateSlise=createSlice({name:"sidebarState",initialState:initialState,reducers:{reset:function reset(state){return initialState;},setSidebrSate:function setSidebrSate(state,action){state.active=action.payload;}}});var setSidebrSate=sidebarStateSlise.actions.setSidebrSate;export{setSidebrSate};export var selectSidebrSate=function selectSidebrSate(state){return state.sidebarState.active;};export var sidebarStateReducer=sidebarStateSlise.reducer;
